config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
for input in "${@}"
do
  # If file, skip to next loop iteration
  [[ -f "${input}" ]] && continue

  # If we reach here, at least one path is not a file
  echo -n 'false'
  exit 1
done

# If we reach here, all paths are files
echo -n 'true'
